rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Avian flu has now been detected in flocks of birds in Virginia and Kentucky, just days after Indiana officials had to euthanize 29,000 turkeys due to the spread of the virus [avian flu], the U.S. Department of Agriculture announced Monday.
